languages.text: "Тогда прислушайся к моему ответу, элантах. Ибо тому, кто привык упиваться собственным могуществом и стремится извратить мир вокруг лишь под себя, может быть сложно осознать сказанное. Постарайся понять не мои слова, но смысл, сокрытый за их звучанием". {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза, и слова ее льются протяжно и мелодично.{/n}

"Then listen closely to my answer, elantach. You may struggle to comprehend what is to be said, being accustomed to revelling in your own might and skewing the world to suit yourself. Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тогда прислушайся к моему ответу, элантах. Ибо тому, кто привык упиваться собственным могуществом и стремится извратить мир вокруг лишь под себя, может быть сложно осознать сказанное. Постарайся понять не мои слова, но смысл, сокрытый за их звучанием". {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза, и слова ее льются протяжно и мелодично.{/n}

Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

"Then listen closely to my answer, elantach. You may struggle to comprehend what is to be said, being accustomed to revelling in your own might and skewing the world to suit yourself. Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

languages.text: «Entonces presta atención a mi respuesta, elantach. Quizá te cueste entender lo que voy a decirte, dada tu afición a deleitarte con tu propio poder e interpretar el mundo a tu antojo. Centra tu discernimiento no en mis palabras, sino en el significado que yace oculto en los matices de sus sonidos». {n}Yrliet entorna los ojos y deja escapar las palabras de forma gradual y melódica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then listen closely to my answer, elantach. You may struggle to comprehend what is to be said, being accustomed to revelling in your own might and skewing the world to suit yourself. Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entonces presta atención a mi respuesta, elantach. Quizá te cueste entender lo que voy a decirte, dada tu afición a deleitarte con tu propio poder e interpretar el mundo a tu antojo. Centra tu discernimiento no en mis palabras, sino en el significado que yace oculto en los matices de sus sonidos». {n}Yrliet entorna los ojos y deja escapar las palabras de forma gradual y melódica.{/n}

languages.text: 「では、我の答えをしっかりと聞くといい、エランタ。自分の力に酔いしれ、自分の都合のいいように世界を操ることに慣れていると、何を言われるのか理解するのに苦労するかもしれない。我が発する言葉ではなく、言葉の裏に秘められた影を読み取るように努めてほしい」{n}ユリエットは目を半分閉じて、ゆっくりと音楽を奏でるように言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then listen closely to my answer, elantach. You may struggle to comprehend what is to be said, being accustomed to revelling in your own might and skewing the world to suit yourself. Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「では、我の答えをしっかりと聞くといい、エランタ。自分の力に酔いしれ、自分の都合のいいように世界を操ることに慣れていると、何を言われるのか理解するのに苦労するかもしれない。我が発する言葉ではなく、言葉の裏に秘められた影を読み取るように努めてほしい」{n}ユリエットは目を半分閉じて、ゆっくりと音楽を奏でるように言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}

languages.text: “那么，请认真聆听我的回答，外界人。或许你一时难以理解我的话，因为你们总是沉醉于夸耀自己的力量，打算操纵整个世界为自己所用。请不要拘泥于我的词句，尝试理解语言在修辞之下的真正含义。”{n}伊莉耶特半垂目光，她的话语如诗卷般不疾不徐地展开。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then listen closely to my answer, elantach. You may struggle to comprehend what is to be said, being accustomed to revelling in your own might and skewing the world to suit yourself. Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那么，请认真聆听我的回答，外界人。或许你一时难以理解我的话，因为你们总是沉醉于夸耀自己的力量，打算操纵整个世界为自己所用。请不要拘泥于我的词句，尝试理解语言在修辞之下的真正含义。”{n}伊莉耶特半垂目光，她的话语如诗卷般不疾不徐地展开。{/n}

languages.text: « Alors écoutez attentivement ma réponse, elantach. Il se peut que vous ayez du mal à comprendre, {mf|accoutumé|accoutumée} que vous l'êtes à votre propre puissance et à soumettre le monde à votre guise. Ne cherchez pas à percer le sens de mes paroles, mais sentez ce qui se cache dans l'ombre de leur sonorité. » {n}Yrliet ferme à demi les yeux et laisse ses mots s'écouler d'elle mélodieusement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then listen closely to my answer, elantach. You may struggle to comprehend what is to be said, being accustomed to revelling in your own might and skewing the world to suit yourself. Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Alors écoutez attentivement ma réponse, elantach. Il se peut que vous ayez du mal à comprendre, {mf|accoutumé|accoutumée} que vous l'êtes à votre propre puissance et à soumettre le monde à votre guise. Ne cherchez pas à percer le sens de mes paroles, mais sentez ce qui se cache dans l'ombre de leur sonorité. » {n}Yrliet ferme à demi les yeux et laisse ses mots s'écouler d'elle mélodieusement.{/n}

languages.text: "Dann hört genau zu, wie ich antworte, Elantach. Es könnte Euch schwerfallen, das Gesagte zu begreifen. Ihr seid es so gewohnt, in Eurer eigenen Macht zu schwelgen und die Welt nach Euren Wünschen zu verbiegen. Richtet Euer Verständnis nicht auf meine Worte, sondern auf den Sinn, der im Schatten ihres Klangs verborgen liegt." {n}Yrliet schließt halb die Augen. Ihre Worte entfalten sich langsam und melodisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then listen closely to my answer, elantach. You may struggle to comprehend what is to be said, being accustomed to revelling in your own might and skewing the world to suit yourself. Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann hört genau zu, wie ich antworte, Elantach. Es könnte Euch schwerfallen, das Gesagte zu begreifen. Ihr seid es so gewohnt, in Eurer eigenen Macht zu schwelgen und die Welt nach Euren Wünschen zu verbiegen. Richtet Euer Verständnis nicht auf meine Worte, sondern auf den Sinn, der im Schatten ihres Klangs verborgen liegt." {n}Yrliet schließt halb die Augen. Ihre Worte entfalten sich langsam und melodisch.{/n}

languages.text: "O zaman cevabımı iyi dinle elantach. Kendi gücünden keyif almaya ve dünyayı kendine uydurmaya alıştığın için söyleyeceklerimi kavramakta zorlanabilirsin. Kelimelerime değil, çıkardığım seslerin altında yatan anlama odaklan." {n}Yrliet gözlerini kısıyor. Kelimeler, yavaşça ve melodik bir şekilde dudaklarından dökülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then listen closely to my answer, elantach. You may struggle to comprehend what is to be said, being accustomed to revelling in your own might and skewing the world to suit yourself. Pitch your understanding not toward my words, but the sense that lies hidden in the shade of their sounds." {n}Yrliet half-closes her eyes, her words unfurling slowly and melodically.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "O zaman cevabımı iyi dinle elantach. Kendi gücünden keyif almaya ve dünyayı kendine uydurmaya alıştığın için söyleyeceklerimi kavramakta zorlanabilirsin. Kelimelerime değil çıkardığım seslerin altında yatan anlama odaklan." {n}Yrliet gözlerini kısıyor. Kelimeler yavaşça ve melodik bir şekilde dudaklarından dökülüyor.{/n}
